input_text:
Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Job Type

Full-time

Description

Spatial Front Inc. (SFI) is a company that offers IT solutions to federal, state, and local governments as well as the private sector. Currently, SFI is seeking a highly qualified Business Analyst with excellent communication skills. The ideal candidate will provide support in business operations, project management, and business analysis for projects and operational activities that serve our government clients. To be considered for the position, the candidate should have relevant experience in the following areas:

Primary Responsibilities

A successful candidate must fulfill the following requirements to be considered:Willing to work regular business hours synced with the East Coast time zone.At least five years of business analyst experience. Previously worked at least two years in a fully remote role.Comfort with and ability to work in MS Office suite.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.Plans and supports specific business, management, functional, technical, and professional or policy areas of the project.Provide support to clients, including schedule management, deliverable development, and tracking, meeting attendance and note taking, etc. Develop high-level business process models.Develop functional requirements, which include defining and documenting requirements.Coordinate Joint Application Development (JAD) sessions.Conduct requirements review and analysis sessions.Provide technical input into regulatory and rule development as needed.Develop, update, and complete documents such as business process mapping and analysis of alternatives (AoA).Prepare and oversee work plans and release schedules.Develop feasibility and alternative IT approaches while considering benefits and risks. Identify and prepare data migration analysis from the current system.Support requirement prioritization with stakeholders and senior leadership. Create flowcharts in tools such as Figma and Visio.Create mockups using Adobe XD or similar software. Perform User Acceptance Testing (UAT). Develop User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI) designs to enhance system usability and effectiveness. Use project management software such as Jira or Asana. Use data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Key responsibilities include:Identifying issues.Conducting analysis and assessment of these issues.Providing inputs to major program/project leaders.Support the Project Manager to communicate and coordinate meetings, and presentations, and develop work products. 

Requirements

Minimum of a bachelorâ€™s degree in a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience is required. Ability to fulfill all of the primary responsibilities above.Able to be professional in a fast-paced environment with many different personalities.


Additional Information

To meet the clearance requirements for this opportunity, candidates must be authorized to work in the US.All candidates will be subject to a complete background check to include, but are not limited to Criminal History, Education Verification, Professional Certification Verification, Verification of Previous Employment, and Credit History.Public Trust background investigations can take approximately four to eight weeks and require fingerprinting.


Other Information

The salary for this position is $60,000 - $90,000 annuallyFor information on SFI's benefits please visit http://www.spatialfront.com/pages/career.htmlThis is a full-time W2 position. Please no agencies, third parties, or corp-to-corp.Spatial Front Inc. is an Equal-opportunity Employer, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.Spatial Front Inc. participates in E-Verify.


Salary Description

$60,000-$90,000

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
